value:
$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Oh, Minerva! There you are!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Maria? What are you wear—$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|I'm here for the spring festival too!
I dressed up so we would match!
What do you think?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Hm... So that's what all this is
about? Well, then... Yes, you're
very cute. Now—$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Yay! I feel like I've been waiting
forever to finally get to enjoy this
festival with you and Michalis!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|...Michalis is here too? For the
spring festival, or some other
motive, I wonder.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|I'll go find him, and you can ask!
You wait right there!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Wait—Maria! ...Urgh.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_双界ソニア,ch10_10_Sonya_FF_Pair,Face|You see, Tharja, the key to...proper
festival spirit is taking the desires of
others into account.$k$p$nMPID_サーリャ|Hm... How's this? I... I'm a cute
bunny? Look how cute I am.
Hip...pity hop hop?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_SpringFes22,Face|Hah! Those outfits are delightful!
...So, uh, what are you two doing?$k$p$WmMPID_サーリャ,ch10_10_Sonya_FF_Pair,Face|...We're not here for your enjoyment,
Henry, or to answer your questions.
One more giggle out of you, and I'll—$k$p$nMPID_双界ソニア|Now, now! We don't need to be
threatening each other in the
middle of the festival, do we?$k$p$nMPID_サーリャ|O-oh... Right... Festival spirit.$k$pHippity...hop?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_サーリャ,ch10_10_Sonya_FF_Pair,Face|May the spring sun embrace you
with its fuzzy, warm brilliance!$k$p$nMPID_双界ソニア|You are getting better and better
at that! Almost TOO cute!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_SpringFes22,Face|All right, then. I've seen enough!$k$pOoo! What's that over there?$k$p$Sbs150|
